you're miserable. i used to be like that, too. i hated my job. my Whole life was reduced to cAring for my ill mother. i know how you feel and i'm ready to free you from the oppression of all Things mundane. i'll help you to finally feel alive.
you've already Chosen happiness. but it's a substance that can be sHared. we will share our happiness wiTh you.

name: Smeesa Street

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+ (x86)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Smeesa Street is a branching visual novel and an interesting way to spend time for those who enjoy atmospheric horror stories. Message us and you'll forget about your troubles. You'll be drowning in happiness. This is your path to endless joy.
